title: What's the rush? Canadians Justyn Knight, Sage Watson call COC decision 'premature' - CBC.ca
description: What's the rush? Canadians Justyn Knight, Sage Watson call COC decision 'premature' CBC.ca Coronavirus: Canadian IOC member expects 2020 Olympics will be postponed Global News Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games likely to be postponed | Coronavirus Updat DW News Editori…
content:
Justyn Knight says he loves his country and didn't mean any disrespect, but he and other athletes are struggling to understand why the Canadian Olympic Committee made a bold decision Sunday to pull its team out of the Tokyo Games this summer.
